main: ^I'm one of the groundskeepers of this place, ruff.
^Day in and day out, I get rid of those blobby distractions...and of course, I do it best!
^Ruff, ask me anything about 'em. I'm the best dog for the job.

c-0: ^Those cotton candies are made up of elemental energy. As a result, they weigh nothing much. I always make sure to push 'em into traps just 'cos I can.
c-1: ^Be careful of these - they're immune to fire. The last time we threw bombs at 'em, nothing happened! Your best bet is to get up close and whack 'em silly.
c-2: ^All right, take care out there! A small human like you gotta be careful not to break any bones.
